"""

http://weixin.cqcqcq.cn/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=80
Beautiful Soup 4 ä½¿ç”¨å‚è€ƒ: http://c.biancheng.net/python_spider/bs4.html
å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–ï¼š
pip install httpx bs4
"""
import httpx
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import csv
from pathlib import Path # å¹¿å·
# /index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=76
# ä½›å±±

# /index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=83 urlsss = [ ["å¹¿å·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=76"], ["ä½›å±±", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=80"], ["æ·±åœ³", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=77"], ["ç æµ·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=96"], ["æ¹›æ±Ÿ", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=93"], ["è‚‡åº†", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=94"], ["æ±Ÿé—¨", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=83"], ["æ±•å¤´", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=88"], ["éŸ¶å…³", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=90"], ["èŒ‚å", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=85"], ["æƒ å·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=82"], ["æ¢…å·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=86"], ["æ±•å°¾", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=89"], ["æ²³æº", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=81"], ["é˜³æ±Ÿ", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=91"], ["æ¸…è¿œ", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=87"], ["ä¸œè", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=79"], ["ä¸­å±±", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=95"], ["æ½®å·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=78"], ["æ­é˜³", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=84"], ["äº‘æµ®", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=92"], ["é¡ºå¾·", "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=3411"] ] param = "/index.php?m=radio&c=index&a=list4city&city_id=76" url = "http://weixin.cqcqcq.cn%s" header = {"UserAgent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0.1;)"} current_dir = Path(__file__).parent def getListElement(list: list, num: int) -> str: """get list element by id without error""" try: return list[num].text.strip() except IndexError: return None def parser(url) -> dict: """è§£æå•ä¸ªä¸­ç»§çš„é¡µé¢,è¿”å›å•ä¸ªä¸­ç»§å‚æ•° dict""" with httpx.Client(headers=header) as client: resp = client.get(url) soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.text, 'html.parser') tags = soup.find(class_="card") name = tags.find(class_="comment").text.strip() info = tags.find_all(class_="item-after light") fq_rec = getListElement(info, 1) fq_diff = getListElement(info, 2) fq_transmit = getListElement(info, 3) mute = getListElement(info, 4) return { "name": name, "R": fq_rec, "diff": fq_diff, "T": fq_transmit, "CSDT": mute } def getCityRelayUrl_Generator(cityUrl): """æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªåŸå¸‚ä¸­ç»§é¡µé¢çš„URL""" with httpx.Client(headers=header) as client: resp = client.get(url % cityUrl) # create parser object soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.text, 'html.parser') tags = soup.find( class_="list-block media-list comment" ).find_all("a") for tag in tags: yield url % tag["href"] def writeCSV(file, res_dict: dict = None, header=False, title: str = None): if title: file.write("\n%s\n" % title) fieldnames = ["åç§°", "æ¥æ”¶é¢‘ç‡", "é¢‘å·®", "å‘å°„é¢‘ç‡", "å“‘éŸ³"] writer = csv.DictWriter(file, fieldnames=fieldnames) if header: writer.writeheader() if res_dict: writer.writerow({ "åç§°": res_dict["name"], "æ¥æ”¶é¢‘ç‡": res_dict["R"], "é¢‘å·®": res_dict["diff"], "å‘å°„é¢‘ç‡": res_dict["T"], "å“‘éŸ³": res_dict["CSDT"], } ) def main(): # å†™å…¥ csv æ–‡ä»¶ # ANSI ä½¿å¾— excel æ‰“å¼€ä¸ä¼šä¹±ç  # newline å®šä¹‰æ–°ä¸€è¡Œçš„ç©ºæ ¼ with open("%s" % Path(current_dir, "å¹¿ä¸œä¸­ç»§æ€»è¡¨.csv"), 'w', encoding="ANSI", newline='') as csvfile: for url in urlsss: print("æ­£åœ¨çˆ¬å–...%s" % url[0]) writeCSV(csvfile, header=True, title="%s" % url[0]) for relay_url in getCityRelayUrl_Generator(url[1]): data_dict = parser(relay_url) print(data_dict) writeCSV(csvfile, data_dict) print("%sçˆ¬å–ç»“æŸ!" % url[0]) if __name__ == "__main__": main() print("DONE!") â€

å‚æ•°ï¼š Usage of /opt/siyuan/kernel: -accessAuthCode string access auth code -alsologtostderr log to standard error as well as files -lang string zh_CN/zh_CHT/en_US/fr_FR/es_ES -log_backtrace_at value when logging hits line file:N, emit a stack trace -log_dir string If non-empty, write log files in this directory -log_link string If non-empty, add symbolic links in this directory to the log files -logbuflevel int Buffer log messages logged at this level or lower (-1 means don't buffer; 0 means buffer INFO only; ...). Has limited applicability on non-prod platforms. -logtostderr log to standard error instead of files -mode string dev/prod (default "prod") -port string port of the HTTP server (default "0") -readonly string read-only mode (default "false") -ssl for https and wss -stderrthreshold value logs at or above this threshold go to stderr (default 2) -v value log level for V logs -vmodule value comma-separated list of pattern=N settings for file-filtered logging -wd string working directory of SiYuan (default "/opt/siyuan") -workspace string dir path of the workspace, default to ~/Documents/SiYuan/ â€‹/root/siyuan/workspaceâ€‹â€‹ éœ€ä¿æŒå®Œå…¨ä¸€è‡´ã€‚ docker run -d \ -v /root/siyuan/:/root/Documents/SiYuan \ -p 6806:6806 \ -u $(id -u):$(id -g) \

--workspace=/root/Documents/SiYuan \
--accessAuthCode=lovehyy9420 \
